sn56.61:2.1: 7. Paṭhamaāmakadhaññapeyyālavagga
sn56.61:4.1: Atha kho bhagavā parittaṃ nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsuṃ āropetvā bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn56.61:4.2: “taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho bahutaraṃ—
sn56.61:4.3: yo vāyaṃ mayā paritto nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsu āropito, ayaṃ vā mahāpathavī”ti?
sn56.61:4.6: appamattakāyaṃ bhagavatā paritto nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsu āropito.
sn56.61:4.7: Saṅkhampi na upeti, upanidhampi na upeti, kalabhāgampi na upeti mahāpathaviṃ upanidhāya bhagavatā paritto nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsu āropito”ti.
sn56.61:5.1: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, appamattakā te sattā ye manussesu paccājāyanti;
sn56.61:5.2: atha kho eteva bahutarā sattā ye aññatra manussehi paccājāyanti.
sn56.61:6.1: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yogo karaṇīyo … pe …
